fulltext:
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Gender:  Male 
Date of birth: 
10 January 1994 
Address: 
Cau Giay, Ha Noi 
Mobile: 
(+84) ***** 
Email: 
****@gmail.com 
Linkedin: 
https://**** 
NGO QUOC THANG 
JAVA DEVELOPER 
EDUCATION 
9/2012 - 6/2016: Bachelor of Information Technology (Honors Program) at University 
of Engineering and Technology – Vietnam National University (UET-VNU) 
SKILLS 
 
3 years of experience in software development 
 
Back-end: Java, Spring Boot, JPA, Hibernate, RESTful Webservices, Microservices 
 
Secondary skills: Front-end (Angular 2+, basic HTML/CSS), NodeJS 
 
Core programming theories (OOP, Data structures & algorithms, Database design, 
SOLID, Clean code, Design patterns, Problem solving…) 
 
Relational & NoSQL database (MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase) 
 
Version control with Git, SVN 
 
Agile/Scrum process 
 
Confident at English (in basic communication and document researching) 
 
Able and willing to learn new technologies 
 
Responsible, careful, active 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
8/2018 – now: Java Developer at Integro Technologies 
Project: Credit Master Tool 
Features 
 Credit application & credit risk management 
Team size 
 35 
My roles 
 Implement change requests 
 Fix bugs 
 Do testing (follow test cases, write test documents) 
 
11/2016 – 7/2018: Java Developer at Netcompany 
Project: HM Portal 
Features 
 Timesheet Management 
 Expense Management 
 Project Management 
 Leave Request Management 
Team size 
 10 
Technologies 
 Java 8, Spring, Spring Security OAuth2, Angular 2 
 Jenkins, Docker 
 MySQL, Microservices, RabbitMQ 
My roles 
 Develop, test, fix functions in both back-end and front-end 
 
Responsible in database management (design, refactor, 
backup, restore…) 
 Support junior members 
Project: Optunli 
Features 
 
Provides effective recruitment/resource management 
solutions for organizations 
 Helps candidates find jobs they are interested in with 
dynamic matching, application process tracking... 
Team size 
 15 
Technologies 
 NodeJS, MongoDB, Redis, Microservices 
 Angular 2, Redux 
 Jenkins, Docker 
My roles 
 Develop, test, fix functions in both back-end and front-end 
 Support junior members 
 
3/2016 - 9/2016: Software Developer at Van Hoa Viet Media JSC 
Project: Viettel Portal 
Features 
 Provides information and services for millions of customers 
of Viettel Telecom 
 Provides administration and monitoring solutions for 
Viettel's administrators 
Team size 
 15 
Technologies 
 AerospikeDB 
 Elasticsearch 
 Ganglia 
My roles 
 Build a tool for processing, migrating Viettel's data between 
old system and new system 
 Test, fix bugs 
 Write documents, guides 
OTHER EXPERIENCE 
 
Made some Flash games using Flixel library, Photoshop, sound effect editors 
 
Graduation thesis: Building Advertisement Management Module for website
